name: B12
description: B12 is an AI-powered website builder designed for professional service providers to create and manage polished websites quickly.
longDescription: B12 is an AI-driven platform that enables professional service providers to create professional websites in seconds by generating tailored drafts based on user input. Founded in 2015, its mission is to streamline online presence management for small businesses, combining AI automation with human expertise to deliver polished results. The platform addresses the challenges of time-consuming website development by offering intuitive tools for customization, scheduling, invoicing, and marketing. B12 caters primarily to service-based industries like finance, real estate, and consulting, ensuring fast, secure, and SEO-optimized websites. It also integrates with third-party tools to enhance business operations, making it an all-in-one solution for client engagement. By blending AI efficiency with expert support, B12 empowers users to focus on their core business while maintaining a professional online presence.
features: AI-generated website drafts create a tailored site in 60 seconds based on user-provided business details, saving time and effort.
Customizable section editor allows users to regenerate or tweak sections like CTAs and testimonials with AI assistance for easy updates.
Integrated business tools, including scheduling, invoicing, and payments, streamline client interactions and business operations.
Built-in SEO features, such as fast load times, responsive design, and automated sitemaps, improve website visibility on search engines.
Expert design support provides access to professional copywriters and designers to refine and launch websites.
Third-party integrations enable seamless connection with tools like Google Drive for enhanced functionality.
Free hosting and custom domain options ensure a professional online presence without additional costs.
AI-powered content generation drafts web pages, blog posts, and emails instantly, reducing content creation time.
Secure platform with HTTPS and TLS certificates protects user data and builds client trust.
Team collaboration features allow multiple users to manage website updates, client forms, and communication history.

faqs.question: How does B12 create a website so quickly?
faqs.answer: B12 uses AI to generate a personalized website draft in 60 seconds based on your industry and preferences, which you can then customize with expert support.

faqs.question: Is B12 suitable for non-technical users?
faqs.answer: Yes, B12’s intuitive interface and AI-driven tools make it easy for non-technical users to create and manage professional websites without coding skills.

faqs.question: Does B12 offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: B12 provides a free Starter plan that allows users to build a website and use basic features, though it includes B12 branding.

faqs.question: Can I integrate B12 with other tools?
faqs.answer: B12 supports integrations with third-party tools like Google Drive, and you can contact their team to explore additional integration options.

faqs.question: How does B12 support SEO?
faqs.answer: B12 includes built-in SEO features like fast load times, responsive design, automated sitemaps, and metadata to improve search engine rankings.

faqs.question: Can I collaborate with my team on B12?
faqs.answer: Yes, B12 allows you to invite team members to manage website updates, client forms, scheduling, and payments with customizable access levels.

faqs.question: What industries does B12 cater to?
faqs.answer: B12 is tailored for service-based industries such as finance, real estate, consulting, and other professional services.

faqs.question: Can I regenerate website sections if I don’t like them?
faqs.answer: Yes, B12’s AI allows you to regenerate sections like CTAs or testimonials instantly, or you can manually edit individual elements.

faqs.question: Does B12 provide customer support?
faqs.answer: B12 offers expert support from copywriters, designers, and customer success teams, accessible via email at hello@b12.io.
